title: BlueBlocksCraft系列材质更换下载源
author: MC.cdasc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MC.cdasc 于 2016-12-25 15:47 编辑 

近期受360云盘关停影响，许多分享链接失效。本人现决定对BlueBlocksCraft系列材质，将转为Curseforge+OneDrive+DropBox下载。
原有链接不会取消，新的链接至少会加入OneDrive下载地址。
下载地址会陆续放出。
对于旧版本BlueBlocksCraft for 1.6，不再提供新的下载地址。
Onedrive分享居然不能用了？只有用百度了，加密码防止网盘搜索。

replies.author: EternityTQ
replies.txt_content:
所以呢？
直接在原帖发更新说明不就好了..

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
那请问你要加入那里呢 还有直接在自己贴纸说明不就好了吗喂 2333





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
